content.text:
OpenAI introduced GPT‑5.2, a model family for professional work and long‑running agents.
The release emphasizes improvements in spreadsheet/presentation generation, coding, factuality, long‑context understanding, vision, and tool use.
In ChatGPT, GPT‑5.2 Instant, Thinking, and Pro roll out starting with paid plans; in the API, models are available to developers.
OpenAI notes continued safety work and references updated system card details.

tldr: GPT‑5.2 is presented as OpenAI’s most capable GPT series for professional knowledge work and long‑running agent workflows.
Key upgrades focus on better end‑to‑end execution: creating artifacts (spreadsheets/slides), stronger coding, improved reliability, and better performance on very long documents.
Rollout includes three variants in ChatGPT (Instant, Thinking, Pro) and corresponding API model names.

sections.title: What GPT‑5.2 is
paragraphs: GPT‑5.2 is a new model family aimed at professional knowledge work and complex, multi‑step projects. OpenAI positions it as a step forward in general capability, long‑context understanding, tool use, and vision.

sections.title: What’s improved
bullets: More polished generation of work artifacts like spreadsheets and presentations
Stronger software engineering performance for debugging, feature work, and refactors
Fewer factual errors (more dependable for research and analysis, with the usual recommendation to double‑check critical outputs)
Better long‑context reasoning for analyzing very long documents and multi‑file projects
Improved vision and agentic tool‑calling for end‑to‑end workflows

sections.title: Model variants in ChatGPT
bullets: Instant: fast, capable default for everyday work and learning
Thinking: tuned for deeper work (complex tasks, long‑document summaries, math/logic, planning)
Pro: highest-quality option for difficult questions where reliability is prioritized

sections.title: Availability
paragraphs: OpenAI says GPT‑5.2 (Instant, Thinking, Pro) begins rolling out in ChatGPT starting with paid plans, and that the API versions are available to developers.

sections.title: Safety note
paragraphs: OpenAI highlights continued work on safety and reliability, including improvements in responses for sensitive conversations, and points readers to the system card update for details.

es.title: Presentamos GPT‑5.2
es.content:
OpenAI presentó GPT‑5.2, una familia modelo para trabajo profesional y agentes de larga duración.
El comunicado enfatiza las mejoras en la generación de hojas de cálculo/presentaciones, codificación, factualidad, comprensión de contexto largo, visión y uso de herramientas.
En ChatGPT, GPT‑5.2 Instant, Thinking y Pro se implementan comenzando con planes pagos;En la API, los modelos están disponibles para los desarrolladores.
OpenAI señala el trabajo de seguridad continuo y hace referencia a detalles actualizados de la tarjeta del sistema.

ukr.title: Представляємо GPT‑5.2
ukr.content:
OpenAI представила GPT‑5.2, сімейство моделей для професійної роботи та довготривалих агентів.
У випуску наголошується на вдосконаленні створення електронних таблиць/презентацій, кодування, фактичності, розуміння тривалого контексту, бачення та використання інструментів.
У ChatGPT розгортаються GPT‑5.2 Instant, Thinking і Pro, починаючи з платних планів;в API моделі доступні розробникам.
OpenAI відзначає продовження роботи з безпеки та посилається на оновлені дані системної карти.

pt.title: Apresentando GPT-5.2
pt.content:
A OpenAI introduziu o GPT‑5.2, uma família de modelos para trabalho profissional e agentes de longa duração.
O lançamento enfatiza melhorias na geração de planilhas/apresentações, codificação, factualidade, compreensão de contexto longo, visão e uso de ferramentas.
No ChatGPT, GPT‑5.2 Instant, Thinking e Pro são implementados começando com planos pagos;na API, os modelos estão disponíveis para os desenvolvedores.
A OpenAI observa o trabalho contínuo de segurança e faz referência a detalhes atualizados do cartão do sistema.

zh.title: GPT-5.2 简介
zh.content:
OpenAI 推出了 GPT-5.2，这是一个适用于专业工作和长期运行代理的模型系列。
该版本强调电子表格/演示文稿生成、编码、事实性、长上下文理解、愿景和工具使用方面的改进。
在 ChatGPT 中，GPT-5.2 Instant、Thinking 和 Pro 从付费计划开始推出；在 API 中，模型可供开发人员使用。
OpenAI 指出了持续的安全工作并引用了更新的系统卡详细信息。

hi.title: GPT‑5.2 का परिचय
hi.content:
OpenAI ने GPT‑5.2 पेश किया, जो पेशेवर काम और लंबे समय तक चलने वाले एजेंटों के लिए एक मॉडल परिवार है।
यह रिलीज़ स्प्रेडशीट/प्रस्तुति निर्माण, कोडिंग, तथ्यात्मकता, लंबे संदर्भ की समझ, दृष्टि और उपकरण के उपयोग में सुधार पर जोर देती है।
चैटजीपीटी में, जीपीटी‑5.2 इंस्टेंट, थिंकिंग और प्रो को सशुल्क योजनाओं के साथ शुरू किया गया है;एपीआई में, मॉडल डेवलपर्स के लिए उपलब्ध हैं।
OpenAI नोट करता है कि सुरक्षा कार्य जारी है और अद्यतन सिस्टम कार्ड विवरण का संदर्भ देता है।
